name: BattleshipFX
description: BattleshipFX is a JavaFX application that allows you to play at BattleShip against an AI. First I created a console version of the game, then I decided to create a GUI version of it to make the application easy to use.
features: This project includes some advenced features such as a database that stores the scores of the players.
The AI is based on a algorithm that allows it to play intelligently to increase the difficulty of the game.
The application is available on every platform thanks to JavaFX.
The application is easy to use, you just have to click on the cells to place your ships and to attack the enemy's ships.

name: Instant-Weather
description: A JavaScript application that displays the current weather for a given location. This applications uses the France Geograhic API to get all the French cities then it uses the Meteo Concept api to fetch the weather for the selected city.
features: This project uses the France Geograhic API to get all the French cities then it uses the Meteo Concept api to fetch the weather for the selected city.
This website is intuitive and easy to use, you just have to select a city and the application will display the current weather for this city.
The website is responsive and can be used on every device.

name: Portfolio
description: After acquiring a wide range of skills, I decided to create my own portfolio to showcase my projects and my skills and to help with my intern research. I decided to use React to create this website because I wanted to learn this framework and I wanted to create a website that is easy to maintain.
features: This website was created with React and TypeScript.
The website is responsive and can be used on every device.
The website is easy to use and intuitive, you just have to click on the projects to get more informations about them.

name: Petit-Cuistot
description: A PHP application that allows users to share recipes and comment on them. This project was created during my second year of BUT in Computer Science. This project was created with a team of 4 people.
features: This project uses a MySQL database to store the recipes and the comments.
This project uses PHP to create the website and to interact with the database.
This project includes a login system that allows users to create an account and to post recipes and comments.
This project includes a search bar that allows users to search for recipes.
